#Data Visualization with ggplot2

##


```{r firstExample}
library(MASS)
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mammals, aes(x = body, y = brain)) +
        geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
        stat_smooth(method = "lm",
                    col = "red",
                    se = FALSE)
#the line above is a poor fit
#use log to get a better line
ggplot(mammals, aes(x = body, y = brain)) +
        geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
        coord_fixed() + 
        scale_x_log10() +
        scale_y_log10() +
        stat_smooth(method = "lm",
                    col = "#C42126",
                    se = FALSE,
                    size = 1)

```
